name: obsidian-folder-graph-plugin
description: Automatically connect files in Graph View based on folder structure, without cluttering your actual folders. (Uses a shadow index system). （自动基于文件夹结构连接图谱，且不弄乱你的原始文件夹。使用影子索引系统。）

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
